channel.title: URL redirection
channel.description:
[WRONG SECTION] Posting here so people will actually read it.
So, I want to make one of my subdomain's redirect to my IP so I can use it for my server. Yes, my fucking server.
I want it to be like how dodian has his, http://www.play.dodian.com
So I made mine http://www.play.runeore.org and I had it redirect to my IP and port 43594. When I click on the link, my server does get a request, so it should work, right? Wrong, when I type the IP in my client, play.runeore.org. I get an error connecting.
Can anyone help? Maybe I am forwarding the page wrong or something. I've forwarded it with the .htaccess file and with Javascript and PHP. Is there a way to forward it that I haven't done, or am I doing something wrong?
Don't tell me to Fucking google it, because I've been doing that for hours.. [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] At least feign innocence :/[/center]

item.title: URL redirection
item.dc:creator: @Lethal_snow Lethal snow
item.description:
@Lethal_snow wrote:

Don’t you think if you posted in the right section they would be more willing to help. Even though topics like this belong on moparscape.

Read full topic

Read your name, it screams gay.
[/quote]
You are an idiot[/quote]

Great comeback. Now GTFO my topic so people that actually understand the first post can help.
